decantr/core.description: DOM engine — hyperscript rendering, conditional, list, mount, lifecycle

decantr/state.description: Reactive primitives — signals, effects, memos, stores, batch

decantr/router.description: Client-side routing — hash or history mode

decantr/components.description: UI components — all return HTMLElement, all accept inline styles

decantr/tags.description: Proxy-based tag functions for concise markup
decantr/tags.usage: import { tags } from 'decantr/tags'; const { div, p } = tags; div({ class: 'card' }, p('Content'))
